title: S2Downloader
description: The S2Downloader allows to download Sentinel-2 L2A data from the from the AWS Public Datasets, the Sentinel-2 Cloud-Optimized GeoTIFFs managed by element84. It specifically serves the purpose to download data for user-defined area of interests (AOI), defined by a bounding box or whole tiles which are the original data product provided by ESA.
